SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
This class is the main server class which starts a Socket and an RMI server. It handles all the client regardless of whether they are Sockets or RMI
